annotation.spannedText: The measles vaccine is actually one of the most effective vaccines in the world

classMention.mentionClass: The measles vaccine is actually one of the most effective vaccines in the world

annotation.spannedText: the tiered model of antibody response leaves a small percentage of vaccinated people susceptible

classMention.mentionClass: the tiered model of antibody response leaves a small percentage of vaccinated people susceptible

annotation.spannedText: you’re better off being vaccinated even if you end up getting infected

classMention.mentionClass: you’re better off being vaccinated even if you end up getting infected

annotation.spannedText: Your antibody levels might not be high enough to completely protect you, but they’ll still help—the CDC has seen vaccinated patients with measles who only get a rash for about an hour

classMention.mentionClass: Your antibody levels might not be high enough to completely protect you, but they’ll still help—the CDC has seen vaccinated patients with measles who only get a rash for about an hour

annotation.spannedText: importantly for octogenarians (whose immune systems are weaker) and infants, vaccinated patients are much less likely to transmit the disease to other people

classMention.mentionClass: importantly for octogenarians (whose immune systems are weaker) and infants, vaccinated patients are much less likely to transmit the disease to other people

annotation.spannedText: Even if you’re the unlucky sucker who gets infected after vaccination, getting a shot still helps contribute to herd immunity—good job, world citizen

classMention.mentionClass: Even if you’re the unlucky sucker who gets infected after vaccination, getting a shot still helps contribute to herd immunity—good job, world citizen

annotation.spannedText: the more important thing to focus on is vaccinating people to keep the disease from spreading like it has in Disneyland

classMention.mentionClass: the more important thing to focus on is vaccinating people to keep the disease from spreading like it has in Disneyland

annotation.spannedText: Without a change, those numbers will keep going up.

classMention.mentionClass: Without a change, those numbers will keep going up.

annotation.spannedText: When they figure it out, it might help them create a more effective version of the vaccine

classMention.mentionClass: When they figure it out, it might help them create a more effective version of the vaccine
